name: 凯尔文 - Kelvin And The Chateau
name_original: 凯尔文 - Kelvin And The Chateau
description:
Introduction

Kelvin is a pixel-style role-playing game. Play as the high school student Kelvin, you'll make new friends, experience school life, encounter with the Queen of the City of Sighs, and explore the mysteries that happened in this family. The process of your being redempted can save others in return. What's the meaning of life?

This game normally includes a 2-hour gameplay.

Guide

Move: ↑↓←→
Confirm and Investigate: Space / Enter/Z
Menu: X
Run: Shift+
Full screen: Alt+Enter

Developers

This game is made all by Iz, and its English localization by Carlisle. Iz is also a high-school student.
